name: UnmodifiableQueueTest
description: Tests for the UnmodifiableQueue class, ensuring it behaves as an unmodifiable queue.

test_cases.name: testDecorateFactory
test_cases.description: Tests the factory method for creating an unmodifiable queue and ensures it throws a NullPointerException when given null.

test_cases.name: testOffer
test_cases.description: Tests that the offer method throws an UnsupportedOperationException for an unmodifiable queue.

test_cases.name: testPoll
test_cases.description: Tests that the poll method throws an UnsupportedOperationException for an unmodifiable queue.

test_cases.name: testQueueRemove
test_cases.description: Tests that the remove method throws an UnsupportedOperationException for an unmodifiable queue.

test_cases.name: testUnmodifiable
test_cases.description: Tests that the objects created by makeObject and makeFullCollection are instances of Unmodifiable.
